Message.Title: Low Floater Ready to Skyrocket
Message.Msg: Concurrent (CCUR) has gained 12 months straight and has the best looking chart with the most momentum. It was just announced that there were 45 million online streams of the NCAA March Madness Basketball Tournament games, up 158% from last year, with 60% of them over mobile devices! CCUR will capitalize most on this! CCUR's MediaHawk delivers video in any format, to any screen, over any network, at any time. MediaHawk multi-screen technology is now powering the multi-screen service of Virgin Media (VMED) the largest cable TV company in the UK. CCUR is powering a similar multi-screen video service for the largest cable TV company in Japan! CCUR was the 1st company to introduce video on demand (VOD) technology 13 years ago and they currently hold a 30% market share of the VOD market with 212 VOD deployments across 4 continents, reaching a total of 50mm VOD homes! CCUR is currently $7.19 per share with only 9.2mm shares outstanding, $24.6mm in cash, no debt, and an enterprise value of only $41.55mm or just 0.63X its revenue annualized $66.4mm! CCUR's EPS last quarter was double the previous quarter and quadruple two quarters ago. CCUR's main competitor Seachange (SEAC) is a money losing but is already trading with an enterprise value/revenue ratio of 1.81, which would make CCUR a $15 per share stock!

Message.Title: WHY ISN'T JON CORZINE IN PRISON
Message.Msg: A person steals a pair of socks from WMT, is caught, put in handcuffs and is booked for Petite Larceny. By the time his case goes to court he has already spent 3 days in jail. He is then fined by the court, and released with a stern warning from the Judge if he does it again he will be looking at 1-3 years in jail. Jon Corzine will have his team of lawyers, and no matter how much money is taken he will be allowed to plead "I neither admit or deny guilt." He is then fined a sum equal to almost 0 when it is compared to the missing money., and away he goes. He will not spend a single day in jail.

Topic.Title: WHY ISN'T JON CORZINE IN PRISON

Message.Msg: Don't know whether Corzine did anything criminal or not. Do know that prior assurances that customer balances in segregated accounts were perfectly safe were foolishly made and foolishly believed. In many cases, these assurances were made by futures brokers pitching small trader/hedger business. When push came to shove, turned out there was nobody standing behind the account balances, certainly not the Merc or the taxpayer.

Message.Title: BAC vs other banks
Message.Msg: BAC should pull in somewhere between .90 and a $1.0 in earnings this year - the other money center banks are trading at 9-11x , Well Fargo is 11X for example and that is among the highest besides BAC. Feel like 12.20-12.50 should be the top. I get TBV at $13 so I do wrestle with the valuation and where it should be. The announcement about potentially raising bank requirements after hours tonight did not move any of the banks down. In fact the same set up going into earnings is happening - a run up only to be sold off when the first financials report. It has happened almost every quarter.
